sentence: ), for instance, raised a war chest of around $6.5 million in 2021, and is entering the 2022 election year with just under $5 million, while her opponent, Harriet Hageman, has about $380,000 in cash on hand.
author: William Vaillancourt
title: Republicans Who Voted to Impeach Trump Are Fundraising Laps Around Their MAGA Primary Opponents
